snippet: Mariangela Kefalas was fired a week after telling her supervisor at International Preschools that she had seen Malthe Thomsen touching students inappropriately.
abstract: Preschool teacher Mariangela Kefalas files suit in State Supreme Court in Manhattan, claiming she was fired from International Preschools in retaliation for reporting allegations that co-worker Malthe Thomsen touched children inappropriately.
lead_paragraph: Mariangela Kefalas was fired a week after telling her supervisor at International Preschools that she had seen Malthe Thomsen touching students inappropriately.

headline.main: Manhattan Preschool Teacher Who Alleged Abuse Sues Over Firing
headline.print_headline: A Teacher Who Alleged Abuse Sues Over a Firing
